about.description: I'm a Front-end developer based near Heilbronn, Germany. I enjoy helping designers and companies bring their ideas into real life. I'm looking forward to continuing my developer career with a job in a junior web developer position.
about.request_to_contact: If you think I'd be a good match for your projects, contact me!

portfolio.introduction: Explore a selection of my work here. - Interact with projects to see my skills in action. While coding, I always follow the 'Small Screen First' principle.
portfolio.description_join: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
portfolio.description_mermaid: A simple swim-and-shoot game based on an object-oriented approach. Help the mermaid to find pearls and stars to fight against a variety of fish and collect the golden key to open the treasure chest in the end.
portfolio.description_pokedex: Based on the Pok√©API a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.

contact.question: Want to discuss a new project?
contact.request_to_contact: Say hello! Let's discuss your ideas and make it happen.
contact.name: Your name
contact.confirmation: I've read the privacy policy and agree to the processings of my data as outlined.
